name: Taco Dip
author: Linda Menz
instructions: Brown ground beef, add taco seasoning and simmer as directions say. Add refried beans and 1/2 cup picante sauce. In a separate bowl, mix cream cheese and 1/4 cup picante sauce. Layer in a 9x13 pan ending with a layer of cheese on top. Bake at 350Â° for 20 to 25 minutes. Use corn or tortilla chips to dip.
